TITLE_ALT: You no longer need to trust governments and companies. With BlockChain technology, real luck is now with you.
TITLE_BUTTON_2: How to Play Watch and learn.
TITLE_ALT_FINISH: Luck has come your way, start winning now.
FEATURES_TITLE: Buy a ticket and take a seat and wealth will come to you
FEATURES_ALT: Monitor every transaction made with the reliability of BlockChain technology.
FEATURES_LIST_1_ALT: Our ticket sales are BUSD, USDT, Dao etc. It will be carried out with stable coins.
FEATURES_LIST_2: Bigger rewards every game than the next
FEATURES_LIST_2_ALT: At the end of each game, 10% remains in the bank, which means that each new game starts with a larger amount than the next.
FEATURES_LIST_3_ALT: At the end of each game, $TYKHE TOKEN is given to the winning number and 3 more people, depending on the size of the pool.
FEATURES_LIST_4_ALT: The game lasts for a total of 24 hours, at the end of the game only 1 ticket takes all the collected money. 10% of the vault is transferred back to the vault, 10% goes to the developers, of which 50% is added to lp for $TYKHE TOKEN. Thus, all players win.
SECONDRY_FEATURES_TITLE: Playing the lotto with crypto has never been so simple.
SECONDRY_FEATURES_ALT: Connect your wallet, choose your stablecoin, enter the number of tickets and play.
SECONDRY_FEATURES_LIST_1_ALT: Monitor the status of the game instantly
SECONDRY_FEATURES_LIST_1_DESC: See all possibilities with real-time data monitoring.
SECONDRY_FEATURES_LIST_2_DESC: Each ticket is created and presented specifically for you.
SECONDRY_FEATURES_LIST_3_DESC: Customize your profile and show who is the winner.
JOIN_OUR_COMMUNITY_ALT: Join our Telegrama account and get TYKHE.SPACE all the technical support you need.
ROADMAP_ALT: The order of rollout may change as some features arrive faster than expected and we try to focus on the features/use cases that are most useful to our partners.

ROADMAP_LIST_3_CHILD.KEY_1: Sharing the designs of the game and updates according to the reactions
ROADMAP_LIST_3_CHILD.KEY_2: Playing games on testnets and feedback

ROADMAP_LIST_4_CHILD.KEY_1: Bringing games to the mainnet and making them playable by everyone.

ROADMAP_LIST_5_CHILD.KEY_1: Distribution and addition of $TYKHE coin to games

ROADMAP_LIST_6_CHILD.KEY_1: Playable in metaverse worlds of playgrounds
ROADMAP_LIST_6_CHILD.KEY_2: Special events and big concerts for METAVERSE

SPECIAL_CONTACT_TITLE: MEET LUCK WITH $TYKHE FOR SPECIAL PARTNERSHIPS.
SPECIAL_CONTACT_DESC: For business questions, developer support, or general inquiries, contact our team via our Discord. Once verified, go to the #support channel and our Moderators will set you up with the team. Our team consists of several dedicated working groups to ensure that any issue can be met with our full support.
